title:
Highest weight category structures on $Rep(B)$ and full exceptional
  collections on flag varieties over $\mathbb Z$
authors: Alexander Samokhin, Wilberd van der Kallen
abstract:
This paper constructs full exceptional collections in the bounded derived
categories of coherent sheaves of flag schemes of Chevalley group schemes over
$\mathbb Z$. The ensuing semiorthogonal decompositions are compatible with the
Bruhat order on Weyl groups. The terms of full exceptional collections are a
priori complexes of coherent sheaves; the question whether they are actually
coherent sheaves is to be investigated further. The construction builds upon
the foundational results on $B$-modules from the works of Mathieu, Polo, and
van der Kallen, and upon properties of the Steinberg basis of the
$T$-equivariant $\sf K$-theory of $G/B$.
